trans-unit.source: Represents a currency value ranging from -2 <sup>63</sup> (or -922,337,203,685,477.5808) to 2 <sup>63</sup> -1 (or +922,337,203,685,477.5807) with an accuracy to a ten-thousandth of currency unit to be stored in or retrieved from a database.
The actual value of the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney> object is stored in <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney.Value%2A>.
